name: Corona Monster
description:
As we know, coronaviruses are a gathering of related infections that cause sicknesses in well evolved creatures and winged animals. In people, coronaviruses cause respiratory tract contaminations that can extend from mellow to deadly. Gentle ailments incorporate a few instances of the normal cold (which has other potential causes, dominatingly rhinoviruses), while progressively deadly assortments can cause SARS, MERS, and COVID-19. Indications in different species change: in chickens, they cause an upper respiratory tract sickness, while in bovines and pigs they cause looseness of the bowels. There are yet to be immunizations or antiviral medications to forestall or treat human coronavirus diseases.

So, we think make this game about coronavirus , so we can play this game to reduce our stress about Corona. So, this monster in game must get coronavirus to get score and avoid bomb.
